Configure the audit trail warning for users

1 In the Auxiliary Tables folder, double-click Configuration Parameters.

2 In the Value column, click the cell next to Show warning message for patient access.

3 Enter N, A or V as follows:

N to not display a warning

A to show the warning when users opens any patient chart

V to show the warning only when users opens a “VIP” patient chart.

4 Press Enter.

The message will be displayed whenever a user opens the record of a VIP patient.
